sentences.en: Absence of libido may or may not correlate with infertility or impotence.
sentences.cn: 力比多的缺失与不育症以及阳痿的联系也并非绝对.

sentences.en: But the most important function humble hippocampus is the treatment of impotence.
sentences.cn: 但海马的最重要功能是治疗阳痿.

sentences.en: Dole will address in TV commercials sexual impotence and general health education for men.
sentences.cn: 多尔将在电视广告中大谈把重点放在性无能和男人一般健康的教育性广告上.

sentences.en: Folk applications include rheumatoid arthritis, impotence, irregular menses, placenta not being expelled after birth.
sentences.cn: 民间雪莲用于治疗风湿性关节炎 、 阳痿 、 妇女月经不调 、 胎衣不下.

sentences.en: His fists clench and unclench in leashed frustration at his impotence.
sentences.cn: 他的拳头握紧,然后又因为挫败感而松开.

sentences.en: His impotence to help made him despair.
sentences.cn: 他无力帮忙,感到很失望.

sentences.en: Impotence affects 10 million men in the U.S. alone.
sentences.cn: 仅在美国，就有1千万男子患有阳痿。

sentences.en: Impotence is often treated with seahorses steeped in rice wine.
sentences.cn: 泡海马的洒常用于治疗阳痿.

sentences.en: Seeing the profits slip from Hugh's fingers, Scarlett became frenzied at her impotence and his stupidity.
sentences.cn: 利润从休的手上流走了,他这么愚蠢, 思嘉自己又夫能为力,因此急得不得了.

sentences.en: Smoking may reduce the blood flow and causes impotence.
sentences.cn: 吸烟可减少血液流动,引起无力、虚弱.

sentences.en: The factory was also making fake male impotence drugs.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂还生产假冒的男用壮阳药品.

sentences.en: The omnipotence of love is its impotence.
sentences.cn: 爱的无限威力在于爱的不堪一击.

sentences.en: The power of love is its impotence.
sentences.cn: 爱的无限威力在于爱不堪一击.

sentences.en: Their discovery could herald a cure for some forms of impotence.
sentences.cn: 他们的发现可能预示着为某些类型的阳痿找到了医治方法。

sentences.en: There is strength in numbers, but impotence in singlehandedness.
sentences.cn: 人多势众, 孤掌难鸣.

sentences.en: We have reduced the enemy to impotence.
sentences.cn: 我们已经使敌人丧失战斗力.

words.tran_cn: 无力的；无效的；虚弱的；阳萎的
虚弱地；无能为力地；阳痿地
无力；无效；无法可想；性无能
[泌尿][中医]阳萎；虚弱；无效（等于impotency）

trans.tran_en: Impotence is a man's sexual problem in which his penis fails to get hard or stay hard
